OnlyLive.label: Stream must be live
OnlyLive.tooltip: If enabled the command will only work while the stream is live

SoundListCommand.label: Sound List command
SoundListCommand.tooltip: The command to list all available sound words

SoundListSeparator.label: Sound List Separator
SoundListSeparator.tooltip: The separator that will be used for Sound list command.

SoundListMsg.label: Sound List Message
SoundListMsg.tooltip:
Message that shows all available sounds.
 {0} = Sound List, required

UseCD.label: Use Cooldown
UseCD.tooltip: If enabled the sounds will have cooldown

StreamerIgnoreCD.label: Streamer ignores cooldown
StreamerIgnoreCD.tooltip: If enabled the sounds cooldown for streamer will be ignored

GlobalCooldownMsg.value: {0} the command is still on cooldown for {1} seconds!
GlobalCooldownMsg.label: Cooldown Response
GlobalCooldownMsg.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on global cooldown. 
 {0} = user and 
 {1} = time remaining, both are required

UserCooldownMsg.value: {0} the command is still on user cooldown for {1} seconds!
UserCooldownMsg.label: User Cooldown Response
UserCooldownMsg.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 {0} = user and 
 {1} = time remaining, both are required

BtnDefaultSettings.label: Restore Default Settings
BtnDefaultSettings.tooltip:
Reset settings back to defaults.
Reload Scripts afterwards to see the changes in the user interface!
